definition: without a saddle, riding a horse without a saddle, to have unprotected sex
details:
adverb
- without a saddle
= example: without a saddle
= synonyms: barebacked
adjective
- riding a horse without a saddle
= example: riding a horse without a saddle
= synonyms: barebacked
verb
- to have unprotected sex
= example: to have unprotected sex
